name: Emergency Depart Daily Revenue Report
query:
SELECT 
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:300",
    SUM(S.paid_amount) AS "Cash:Currency:100",
    SUM(S.outstanding_amount) AS "Credit:Currency:100",
    SUM(CASE WHEN I.item_group != 'Drug' THEN I.net_amount * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Service Income:Currency:130",
    SUM(CASE WHEN I.item_group = 'Drug' THEN I.net_amount * I.qty ELSE 0 END) AS "Drug Income:Currency:100",
     SUM(S.grand_total) AS "Total Income:Currency:100"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I
ON 
    S.name = I.parent
WHERE  
    S.docstatus = 1
AND 
    S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
AND 
    S.source_order="E.R"
GROUP BY 
    S.patient_name
